sect1.title: Compatible Operating Systems
sect1.para:
RCE releases are provided for Windows and Linux. It is regularly tested on
CentOS 7 (64 bit)
Debian 7 stable (64 bit)
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop ("SLED") 11 SP2 (64 bit)
Windows 7 (64 bit)
It is also confirmed to run (but not as thoroughly tested) on
Mint 17 (64 bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 Workstation (64 bit)
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server ("SLES") 11 SP2 (64 bit)
Ubuntu 12 LTS (64 bit)
Ubuntu 14 LTS (64 bit)
Windows Server 2008 r2 (64 bit)

sect2.title: Support of 32 Bit Operating Systems
sect2.para: Starting with release 6.0.0, only the 64 bit versions of RCE are being fully tested. The 32 bit packages are provided for backwards compatiblity and may be removed in a future release. If you rely on up-to-date 32 bit versions of RCE, or encounter a problem with these packages, please contact the RCE developers so we can take this into account.
